messages.message: kvdByteLength must add up to the sum of the size of the key-value entries with paddings.
messages.details: The processed Key/Value Data length is 56 byte(s) but kvdByteLength is 54 byte(s) and they must match.
Custom key "ZZZZ" found in Key/Value Data.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
